package.name: Stockholm_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
The aim (no pun intended) of this message style is to provide a clean and simple interface that organizes information in an inherently understandable way.
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=1760
